about_the_game:
Ever want to be a superstar? Got big dreams, but no talent? Instead of chasing those dreams, live vicariously through wannabe punk-rocker Ash Blaze as he ditches his monotonous desk job and pursues a life of excitement and adventure, and probably more than a few mornings waking up on the roof of the local pub in nothing but his underwear and his left boot.

Enter an epic head-to-head tournament with worldwide reach, where music is your weapon and fame is your destiny! Face off against all sorts, from established K-pop idol groups and rock-gods to the local cult choir and that one guy who keeps insisting that the keytar will make a comeback.

 

Turn-Based Strategic Combat for Dummies

Use your skill and wits to outperform your enemies - chain together attacks, buffs, and bend the soundscape to your will by planning multiple rounds in advance and having it all play out exactly as you wish in a flood of eardrum shattering beats and pyrotechnics mayhem that would definitely violate workplace health and safety standards.

Forget those boring old heath bars – they’re so 2010s – control the momentum and dominate the stage through the “state-of-the-art” and totally original Tug-of-War combat system; Drown out the tunes from those lame-wads across the stage from you and get them booed off stage to advance to the next stage of the tournament.  

 

A World of Musical Misfits

Every Paul needs his Ringo, every Bob their Marley – Ash can’t win it all by himself, he’ll need a band! Build your flock as you navigate through a city full of musicians who all think they’re way cooler than they actually are. Each new member brings their own deck of tricks to the table, expanding your options on the battle stage.

Talk to people around the stadium to learn about the world, themselves, and even hints to finding collectibles! Choose dialogue options that present you as the next coming of the King of Rock or embrace your inner chaos goblin – whichever speaks to your heart more! There are no wrong answers, so feel free to flip flop around Ash’s personality so much that his band mates start to consider calling a doctor.

 

Orchestrate Your Strategy

Compose your deck from a wide range of abilities – from powerful attacks to deft defensive moves – with even more in the wings. Every card you play shapes the music (literally!), so build a set that works in harmony, or test your luck with a deck that works solely on chaos.

Amplify your repertoire through gathering new cards from a variety of sources: acquire them from the pawn shop, find them down the back alley by dumpster diving, or “appropriate” them from the rivals you’ve crushed (just don’t mention their former bands – it’s a sensitive topic).

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 20.04
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2500K or AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 560 or AMD Radeon HD 7770 (2GB VRAM)
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.13 High Sierra or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 (2014 or later)
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal-capable Intel HD Graphics 5000 or better
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: A turn-based card battler where your deck creates music as you play. Plan your performance by placing cards on a timeline, compose your strategy note by note, and lead your band of misfits to stardom through a tug-of-war combat system.
